item.title: Blue Origin Flight
item.description: So yesterday was the flight and I wanted to put some obvious observations here and mostly comparsion with Virgin Galactic flight about a week ago. I only go from comparsion point of view because it makes it easy. So first striking difference was that VG used Mr. Colbert to host the show while BO had some way more serious most of the time. Altohugh I must say that one comic thing BO show host was doing repeatedly is reminding about Karman line in different ways and one time she even instantly followed Karman line remark with big windows remark.
